pr_title: HBASE-25356 HBaseAdmin#getRegion() needs to filter out non-regionName…

timeline.bodyText: Worth noting at trace level? Might be fun to enable trace logging on this class and see what users are sending in?
timeline.author: saintstack

replies.bodyText: I think non-regionName input comes from hbase shell, where user can input table name.
replies.author: huaxiangsun

timeline.bodyText: There is Bytes.isHexDigit.  It is missing (c >= 'a' && c <= 'f'). Bytes might be better place for this than here?
timeline.author: saintstack

replies.bodyText: I tried poking around.. you'd think this sort of thing would be available in a lib... but I couldn't find an easy ref after looking for 5 mins.
replies.author: saintstack

timeline.bodyText: Yeah, this should be elsewhere too (RegionInfo as a static since that is where you get the MD5 length from?)... Capitalize the 'd'.... so MD5, not md5.
timeline.author: saintstack

replies.bodyText: Done. I put the new isMD5Hash() in RegionInfo and embed isHexDigit inside this method.
replies.author: huaxiangsun

timeline.message: HBASE-25356 HBaseAdmin#getRegion() needs to filter out non-regionName and non-encodedRegionName
HBASE-25356 HBaseAdmin#getRegion() needs to filter out non-regionName and non-encodedRegionName
